titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Margaret A. Cavanaugh papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Professor of chemistry at St. Mary's College, Notre Dame, Indiana.
archdesc.scopecontent: Paper delivered at the Symposium on the History of Women in Chemistry of the American Chemical Society, entitled, "Contributions of Icie Macy Hoobler to Chemistry"; also transcript of oral interview with Hoobler.
